title: Metaverse-Based Mobile Language Learning Environment Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device usage skills and intermediate-level language proficiency
context.additional_context: Implementation of metaverse-based language learning in smartphone-centric limited technical environments, focusing on cultivating practical language skills applicable to workplace scenarios by professionals

learning_goals: They can apply three or more communication strategies for work-related scenarios through role-playing in a metaverse platform.
They can complete a language project with peer learners using real-time collaboration tools in a virtual reality environment.
They can perform situation-based language learning using metaverse space navigation and avatar interaction functions with over 80% participation.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
